title: EV Charging Station, Green Globes Certified, Package Locker Room
posting_body: ["Tucked away in Southwest Las Vegas Mountain's Edge neighborhood, Mountain Gate & Mountain Trails are here to offer residents a fresh take on luxury living.", 'Updated with modern finishes and designer touches, our 1 & 2 bedroom apartments for rent near Exploration Peak Park supply just the retreat youve been searching for.', '-Package Locker Room', '-Expansive Community Walking and Biking Path to Exploration Park', '-Elevator Access in Select Buildings', '-Two Vibrant Clubhouses with Plasma TV/DVD Player and Java Bar', '-Covered Parking Available', '-Our apartment homes are cleaned only with organic products!', "-Located in Mountain's Edge Master Planned Community", '-Living Green Community Featuring On-Site Recycling Program', '-Mountain Views', '-Green Globes Certified', '-Business Center with Workstations and WiFi', '-EV Charging Station', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Equal housing opportunity*']
